card.name: Seasoned Tactician
card.text: {3}, Exile the top four cards of your library: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
card.flavor:
"The benefits of peace far outweigh the pride of Generals."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

foreignNames.name: Trickreicher Taktiker
foreignNames.text: {3}: Entferne die obersten vier Karten Deiner Bibliothek aus dem Spiel, um allen Schaden zu verhindern, der Dir aus einer Quelle zugefügt wird.

card.originalText: o3: Remove the top four cards of your library from the game to prevent all damage to you from one source.
